results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ወይም በእርሱ ላይ ጨምር፡፡ ቁርኣንንም በዝግታ ማንበብን አንብብ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እኛ ባንተ ላይ ከባድ ቃልን እንጥላለንና፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: የሌሊት መነሳት እርሷ (ሕዋሳትንና ልብን) ለማስማማት በጣም ብርቱ ናት፡፡ ለማንበብም ትክክለኛ ናት፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ላንተ በቀን ውስጥ ረዥም መዘዋወር አልለህ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
